metadata.title: USN-6530-2 -- HAProxy vulnerability
metadata.description: Seth Manesse and Paul Plasil discovered that HAProxy incorrectly handled  URI components containing the hash character (#). A remote attacker could  possibly use this issue to obtain sensitive information, or to bypass  certain path_end rules.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6530-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  haproxy - 1.6.3-1ubuntu0.3+esm1 haproxy-doc - 1.6.3-1ubuntu0.3+esm1 vim-haproxy - 1.6.3-1ubuntu0.3+esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
